text_block_list.text:
The last day of summer training camp.
I couldn't find Matikanetannhauser anywhere, so
I was searching all over the place when——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, is it already that time!
Sorry! I was looking for something.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. I collected them yesterday,
but I forgot to take them back. Where could they be~.

Following her pointing finger——
several spider shells were lined up.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, spider-shaped shells~!
They're spiky and cute!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Oh right, let's decorate the trainer's room with them!
As a summer memory, okay?

Anyway…… with everyone in high spirits,
this year's summer training camp came to an end.
